item.description:

item.title: Overflowing, uncollected, household waste all over the street, 2nd January
item.description:
Half a dozen uncollected bins at this location, recently leaving household waste all over the street. Plus other random items dumped on the pavement.

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Fly tipping, 2nd January
item.description:
Children’s pram has been abandoned. Also across the road and to the side of Batwa House (on the bend of Varcoe Road) there is furniture that has been fly tipped. The pram has been here since approx. 29th December . The furniture (dressing table, mirror) has been there since 30th. There is also a children’s potty opposite the abandoned dressing table.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Varcoe Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gritting required, 2nd January
item.description:
Versailles Road is like an ice rink. Ice all day on road and pavements; no gritting at all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Versailles Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In the road outside 7 Camborne Road,DA16 3LD, 2nd January
item.description:
This pothole is a reoccurring problem. Keeps getting filled in, then appears again even worse than before.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camborne Road, Falconwood, Greater London

item.title: Grit box needs filling, 2nd January
item.description:
The grit box is empty and has not been filled for years. We would like to request this is filled so then we can grit the public roads to prevent them from being icy and dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Batchwood Green, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole in middle lane, 2nd January
item.description:
Pothole between elevated roundabout and Boiler house roundabout. Middle lane, half way along road. It is huge and vehicles are having to swerve into adjacent lane to avoid. Particularly dangerous at night when it is dark,

item.title: Lamp post not working since Aug 2024, 2nd January
item.description:
Same issue over the years, only 1 lamp post that serves the entire corner of Byfield close and it's not been working for a long time. When will it be fixed please? It's been reported 3 times already.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Byfield Close, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wellington Gardens / Charlton Church Ln needs swiping, 2nd January
item.description:
Area needs swiping and a better solution with fox proof bins. The junction at the property agency is problematic but slightly improved. Condoms, tampons, glasses, a trolley on the pavement in Wellingt9n Gardens. Various pots, pans and clothes outside n 40 in Wellington Gardens. Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wellington Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Writing on signs in Lesnes Abbey Woods, 2nd January
item.description:
Writing appeared on lots of signs in Lesnes Abbey Woods. It mainly reads: "dairy trade rape trade". I was quite worried when I saw it, but after some research, it seems to be something animal activists usually write. I came across it on at least 5 different signs near the Woodland Way area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
